channel.title: How To Make Mental Blur Useful
channel.description:
I know I've made a couple threads like this in the past, but I haven't yet given up :stuck_out_tongue:
~~**Mental Blur (Night)** - Erase the chat history of a player.~~
**Mental Blur (Night)** - Introduce a false memory into everyone's consciousness, trollboxing a past message. (2 uses)
It's exactly the same as trollbox, except the trollbox message does not appear as the most recent message in chat. It appears instead at a point chosen by the Illusionist.

item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
If it also destroyed your private notes as well, it could produce some interesting fakeclaim opportunities.

BD: “logs, now”
Reaper: “got mental blurred, gimme a sec to type it up.”

So when you get caught with your pants down and need to type up the rest of your logs, you can use the Illusionist as an excuse.
